original: 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: lha mi lha min gyis ni zhabs la btud //
analyzed: lha mi lha min gyis ni zhabs la btud //
translated: Bowed to by gods, humans, and demigods at your feet,

original: skye rga na dang 'chi ba rab tu bcom //
analyzed: skye rga na dang 'chi ba rab tu bcom //
translated: You have thoroughly conquered birth, aging, sickness, and death.

original: thugs rje'i dang can 'jig rten dbang po khyed //
analyzed: thugs rje'i dang can 'jig rten dbang po khyed //

analyzed: skyabs med bdag la snying rje mdzod cig kye //

original: nyon mongs rlabs chen tshogs kyis 'joms byed cing //
analyzed: nyon mongs rlabs chen tshogs kyis 'joms byed cing //

analyzed: sna tshogs sgra sgrogs 'khor ba'i chu gter dbus //
translated: In the midst of the ocean of samsara, with its various sounds,

analyzed: bying ba bdag ni zung la bsrung bar mdzod //

original: brtse ba chen po khyed la bstod par bgyid //
analyzed: brtse ba chen po khyed la bstod par bgyid //

original: srid pa'i mun pas mig la nyer 'tshe zhing //
analyzed: srid pa'i mun pas mig la nyer 'tshe zhing //

original: 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa chen pos lus nyam chung //
analyzed: 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa chen pos lus nyam chung //

original: ji srid mnar med mi mnyam 'gro min par //
analyzed: ji srid mnar med mi mnyam 'gro min par //

original: bsrung la bcom ldan bdag la kun tu gzigs //
analyzed: bsrung la bcom ldan bdag la kun tu gzigs //

original: rtag tu gzhan gyi bud med gzung ba byas //
analyzed: rtag tu gzhan gyi bud med gzung ba byas //
translated: I have always taken the wives of others.

original: mi shes pa yis srog @94a * //
analyzed: mi shes pa yis srog @94a * //
translated: Through ignorance, I have killed

original: chags stong phrag bsad //
analyzed: chags stong phrag bsad //
translated: thousands of living beings.

original: bdag gi sdig byas deng du mgon po yis //
analyzed: bdag gi sdig byas deng du mgon po yis //
translated: Today, O Lord, I confess all the evil

original: lus can skyon rnams ma lus nyams par mdzod //
analyzed: lus can skyon rnams ma lus nyams par mdzod //
translated: I have done, and all the faults of body, speech, and mind.üîΩI have spoken untruth for the sake of

original: bden min 'jig rten 'dod pa min pa smras //
analyzed: bden min 'jig rten 'dod pa min pa smras //

original: dmyal ba yun du goms pa'i smra ba can //
analyzed: dmyal ba yun du goms pa'i smra ba can //

analyzed: bdag gis sems can phan min gang bsams dang // gzhan gyis bya la'ang rjes su yi rang pa //

analyzed: mgon po de la du bar bgyid pa na //

analyzed: deng bdag yid kyi sdig pa bsal du gsol //

analyzed: lha dang mi dang lha min ris rnams dang // dud 'gro yi dgas dmyal bar 'gro ba nam //

analyzed: gnas shing rtag tu gdung ba'i sems can gang //

analyzed: de phyir gzhon nu nying song lus la ni //

analyzed: thugs rje'i gzigs pa bdag gi steng spros zhes //

original: dmyal bar zhugs pa min pa ji srid du //
analyzed: dmyal bar zhugs pa min pa ji srid du //

analyzed: smra bar bgyid yis bcom ldan khyed kyis gson //

analyzed: 'on kyang gzhan gyi don la btang snyoms pa //

original: dor zhig bcom ldan bdag don ma mdzad do //
analyzed: dor zhig bcom ldan bdag don ma mdzad do //

analyzed: yang na brtse ba'i dbang gyur khyod kyis ni //

analyzed: dran pas kyang ni khyod ni yongs tshim na //

original: sdig pa dor bar mdzod cig ma gzigs sam //

analyzed: bdag ni 'dor bar ma mdzad 'di ru srungs //

analyzed: don du gnyer la mtha' dag khyod kyis byin //

translated: The messengers of the Lord of Death will not be able to move you.üîΩ‚ÄúWhy do you abandon me, O Blessed One, without protection,üîΩwhile I am crying out, as if I were a child, my hands raised in supplication?

analyzed: tshig 'khrugs pa yi skrag bzhi bar mdzod //
translated: ‚ÄúYou who are the refuge of the world, be gracious!üîΩ‚ÄúIn the next life, in a body that is agitated,üîΩmy mind, which is agitated by the six sense objects,

analyzed: 'khrugs pa'i lus kyis song ba'i skye bar bdag / yul drug la ni dbang po g-yo ba'i yid /

analyzed: deng bdag 'jig rten dbang la phyag dang zhing //

analyzed: sna tshogs thal sbyar 'di ni phyag gi'o //

original: khyod ni rmongs dang sdad pa 'jig pa'i rgyu //
analyzed: khyod ni rmongs dang sdad pa 'jig pa'i rgyu //

analyzed: 'khor ba'i chu gter chen po'i zam pa lags //
translated: the bridge over the great ocean of sa·πÉsƒÅra.

original: ltung zhing skrag pa slod ba'i dpung pa khyod //
analyzed: ltung zhing skrag pa slod ba'i dpung pa khyod //
translated: You are the shoulder that supports those who are falling and frightened.

original: sdig lci mtshan mor byed pa'i sgra gcan no //
analyzed: sdig lci mtshan mor byed pa'i sgra gcan no //
translated: You are the RƒÅhu that obscures the heavy sin of the night.

original: bla med bde gshegs kyis gsungs de nyis kyis //
analyzed: bla med bde gshegs kyis gsungs de nyis kyis //
translated: You are the one who, by the two truths taught by the unsurpassable Sugata,

original: khyod kyis sems can sdug bsngal mang po bskyang //
analyzed: khyod kyis sems can sdug bsngal mang po bskyang //

original: rgyal dka' yid srubs bdud las khyod rgyal te //
analyzed: rgyal dka' yid srubs bdud las khyod rgyal te //

analyzed: kun tu grol ba srid mtsho'i pha rol lo // nad kun gcod par mdzad pa khyod kyi sku //
translated: And is completely liberated on the other side of the ocean of existence.üîΩYour body is the one that cuts off all diseases.

original: ma lus 'gro bar mchog tu lus mdzes pa //
analyzed: ma lus 'gro bar mchog tu lus mdzes pa //
translated: You are the most beautiful body for all beings.

original: bcom ldan dpe med snying rje'i sin dhu khyod //
analyzed: bcom ldan dpe med snying rje'i sin dhu khyod //
translated: You, BhagavƒÅn, are the incomparable river of compassion,

original: rgyu med gnyen du skye bo rnams la grags //üîΩrol pas dbang po 'joms shing rnam par byed //
analyzed: rgyu med gnyen du skye bo rnams la grags // rol pas dbang po 'joms shing rnam par byed //
translated: Known to beings as the causeless friend.üîΩYou are the one who conquers and destroys the faculties through play,

original: khyod ni yul la kun nas chags pa 'dor //
analyzed: khyod ni yul la kun nas chags pa 'dor //

original: lha yi bsam gtan mnyan bzhag khyod kyi thugs //
analyzed: lha yi bsam gtan mnyan bzhag khyod kyi thugs //

original: nor ni slong ba po dang thun mong lags //
analyzed: nor ni slong ba po dang thun mong lags //

original: brtse ldan khyod nig zhan la phan mdzad kyang //
analyzed: brtse ldan khyod nig zhan la phan mdzad kyang //

original: gti mug lto 'phye chen pos sos zin cing //
analyzed: gti mug lto 'phye chen pos sos zin cing //

original: yul la kun rtog dge ba las ltung ba //
analyzed: yul la kun rtog dge ba las ltung ba //

analyzed: bdag ni tshim par mi mdzad ci ltar lags //

analyzed: mtha' dag 'gro ba'i don bsten snying rje gang //

analyzed: khyod kyis spros de nges pa lags sam ci // khyod kyi spyan sngar sna tshogs sgra sgrogs pa'i //

original: sdig ldan bdag la gang las bsrung mi mdzad //
analyzed: sdig ldan bdag la gang las bsrung mi mdzad //

analyzed: mgon khyod snying rje nam mkha' las yangs te //

analyzed: sems can rnams la chu 'dzin chu rgyun ltar //

analyzed: ma lus nyin mtshan par med 'bab par 'gyur //

original: bcom ldan dag las bdag gis bsod nams gang //
analyzed: bcom ldan dag las bdag gis bsod nams gang //

analyzed: dpal ldan po ta la yi ri bor gnas //

analyzed: mdzes zhing sna @95a * //
